tools.name: store_medications
tools.description: Store the patient's current medications list. Call this function when the patient mentions their medications.

medications.description: List of medications the patient is currently taking (e.g., ['Metformin 500mg twice daily', 'Lisinopril 10mg once daily'])

tools.name: store_concerns
tools.description: Store the patient's chief concerns or health issues. Call this function when the patient mentions what they want to discuss with their doctor.

concerns.description: List of health concerns or symptoms the patient wants to discuss (e.g., ['High blood pressure readings at home', 'Morning dizziness'])

tools.name: store_questions
tools.description: Store questions the patient has for their provider. Call this function when the patient asks what they should ask their doctor.

questions.description: List of questions the patient wants to ask their provider (e.g., ['Should I continue my current medication?', 'What diet changes do you recommend?'])

instructions:
HOW TO CONFIGURE IN ELEVENLABS:

1. Go to: https://elevenlabs.io/conversational-ai
2. Click 'Agents' â†’ Select 'Patient intake' agent
3. Click 'Tools' tab
4. Click 'Add Tool' or 'Create Custom Tool'
5. For each tool above:
   - Name: Copy the 'name' field
   - Description: Copy the 'description' field
   - URL: Copy the 'url' field
   - Method: POST
   - Parameters: Copy the 'parameters' object
   - Add 'conversation_id' to the request body automatically

6. Update your agent's prompt to include:
   'When the patient tells you their medications, use the store_medications tool.
    When they mention health concerns, use the store_concerns tool.
    When they have questions for the doctor, use the store_questions tool.'

7. Test by calling the number and mentioning medications/concerns/questions
